CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Complete the first lesson stage positioned above or below the Earn a certificate stage?
SRP.A: The Complete the first lesson stage is positioned {above} the Earn a certificate stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Pass the final test?
VE.A: The value of stage Pass the final test is {38%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Earn a certificate?
VE.A: The value of stage Earn a certificate is {12%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the assignment?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the assignment is {70%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Complete the first lesson, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Earn a certificate, with a value of {12%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Complete the first lesson to stage Complete the assignment?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Complete the first lesson to stage Complete the assignment is {30%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Pass the final test to stage Earn a certificate?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Pass the final test to stage Earn a certificate is {26%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 85%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete the first lesson} stage has {100%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 25%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 6% and 85%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete the assignment} stage has {70%}, the {Pass the final test} stage has {38%}, the {Earn a certificate} stage has {12%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, or from stage Pass the final test to Earn a certificate?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete the assignment} to {Pass the final test} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete the assignment} to {Pass the final test} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Pass the final test to Earn a certificate, from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete the assignment} to stage {Pass the final test} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete the assignment} and {Pass the final test} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Pass the final test} and {Earn a certificate} stages.
